ing: 4 cucumbers, trimmed and cut into chunks
n: Watermelon and Cucumber Juice with a Spritz of Lime
des: "Cool and refreshing juice -- mellow watermelon and cucumber juice with a touch of tartness from the lime."
ins: Run the watermelon and cucumber pieces through a juicer following manufacturer's instructions, and place juice  into a pitcher. Stir in lime juice, and serve.
